body_html:
Hi @awav, @johnpjust. Thanks for the feedback! The Bayesflow team has reached a milestone ([1]) which allows us to allocate substantially more resources to creating high quality tooling for MCMC and other approximate inference functions. Let me digest your fantastic feedback and Ill post back with a revised game-plan ASAP.

[1] - https://arxiv.org/abs/1711.10604

body:
Hi @awav, @johnpjust. Thanks for the feedback!  The Bayesflow team has reached a milestone ([1]) which allows us to allocate substantially more resources to creating high quality tooling for MCMC and other approximate inference functions. Let me digest your fantastic feedback and Ill post back with a revised game-plan ASAP.

[1] - https://arxiv.org/abs/1711.10604
